objects.text:
• Undestructable Polycarbonate Shell
• Lightweight Design (40L, 3.65g)
• Quick Access Front Compartment
• USB Charging Port

product_details.description: Accessibility just made a move to the next level. No cap. Our classic Cabin Luggage has now evolved! The Cabin Pro is designed for quick access to help you breeze through security. UNDESTRUCTABLE GERMAN MARKLON POLYCARBONATE SHELL: Casing: Hard LIGHTWEIGHT & INDUSTRY BEST STORAGE: Capacity: 40liter, Weight: 3.65 grams, Dimension : 57.8 x 37 x 24.3 cm SILENT RUN JAPANESE WHEEL TECHNOLOGY: Number of wheels: 8, Super Smooth Hinomoto Wheels THE MOST FEATURE RICH LUGGAGE: USB Port: 1, Powerbank not included, Lock Type: TSA Number Lock, Comes with magic eraser, Dust Bag & Laundry Bag Water resistant: Yes Outer material - Polycarbonate ** Water resistance level - Water Resistant **

banner_details:
The banner presents a modern, travel-focused promotional design that showcases a cabin luggage product. It features a deep forest green background segmented with subtle darker green panels and circular highlights. Diagonal golden accent lines and horizontal gold bars add a sense of movement and sophistication. The heading (`heading`) is set in bold white uppercase text, forming a strong visual contrast, followed by a vibrant gold subheading (`subheading`) that emphasizes the product name. A concise feature list (`description`) appears in minimalist white text, highlighting product benefits. A bold gold price tag (`price`) is placed centrally at the bottom-left, paired with a matching call-to-action button (`cta`) on a solid gold rectangle (`cta_background`). On the right, a high-quality product image (`product_image`) overlaps the layout, integrating seamlessly via proportionate scaling. 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Forest Green: `#2D3F2F`
- Dark Green: `#1E2C20`
- Accent Yellow (Gold): `#FFC107`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a suitcase that utilizes a sophisticated yet vibrant color palette. The primary color is a deep olive green (#4B5A42), giving the product a sturdy and premium look. This base is tastefully accented with a bright mustard yellow (#F5B700), creating high visual contrast and effectively highlighting the edges, zippers, and inner lining. Black (#1C1C1C) details on the handle and wheels add to the sleekness while grounding the design. The inner fabric features a checked pattern in yellow and white (#FFFFFF), creating an energetic contrast. Together, the colors are well-blended yet allow critical design elements to pop.
